QuestData.Title: All Due Respect
QuestData.Description: A group of Adherents came 'round just before the attack on Skettis. Disguised myself as a mushroom, I did. The fools walked right past me.$B$BMy neighbor up the road was not so lucky.$B$BHe had a fondness for texts, if I recall. Might be valuable information in his hut, if you give Reshad a moment to rummage around.$B$BOh, and bring one of his feathers to the shrine near Veil Terokk, would you? He was such a dear, and I know it's what he'd want.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Feather of Syth and the Saga of Terokk.
QuestData.CompletionText: Here, I'll take them both for safekeeping.
QuestData.RewardText: <Reshad presses the feather into the tome before sliding it into his robes.>$B$BWe have one more stop before the wayshrine...
